snippet: The downturn threatens to end one of the longest bull runs in the history of the United States stock market.
abstract: World markets plunge as economic conditions in China worsen and  Federal Reserve winds down its huge stimulus efforts; Dow Jones industrial average is more than 10 percent below high it reached in May, while Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index drops more than 7 percent below recent peak and Nasdaq falls from its latest high by 10 percent.

byline.contributor: Neil Gough and Jack Ewing contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The downturn threatens to end one of the longest bull runs in the history of the United States stock market.

headline.main: Stocks Plunge Sharply for a Second Day on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Stocks Plummet, Threatening End to Long Bull Run

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
